level1.title: Introduction to the Stock Market
level1.description: What is a stock? What is the stock market? Why do companies go public?

level1.title: Core Concepts & Terminology
level1.description: Learn the lingo: Bull vs. Bear markets, Dividends, Market Cap, and Types of Stocks.

level1.title: Getting Started (The "How-To")
level1.description: How to choose a broker, open an account, and place your very first trade.

level1.title: Different Ways to Invest
level1.description: Explore stocks, mutual funds, Exchange-Traded Funds (ETFs), and bonds.

level1.title: The Golden Rules of Investing
level1.description: Learn about Risk vs. Reward, Diversification, Time Horizon, and Compound Interest.

level2.title: Fundamental Analysis
level2.description: Learn to read financial statements (Income, Balance Sheet) and key ratios (P/E, EPS, ROE).

level2.title: Technical Analysis
level2.description: Read charts, understand patterns, and use indicators like Moving Averages and RSI.

level2.title: Investing Strategies
level2.description: Discover different styles: Value, Growth, Dividend, and Passive Index Investing.

level3.title: Advanced Risk Management
level3.description: Master portfolio allocation, rebalancing, position sizing, and stop-loss orders.

level3.title: Introduction to Options Trading
level3.description: Understand Calls, Puts, Strike Prices, and basic strategies like Covered Calls.

level3.title: Other Financial Instruments
level3.description: Get an overview of Futures, Commodities, Forex, and Cryptocurrency as an asset class.

level3.title: Behavioral Finance
level3.description: Learn about the psychology of Fear & Greed, common biases, and disciplined investing.

practical.title: Tools & Platforms
practical.description: Tutorials on using stock screeners, charting platforms, and reading financial news.

practical.title: Paper Trading Simulator
practical.description: Practice with "play money" in a virtual trading platform without any real risk.

practical.title: Case Studies & Analysis
practical.description: Weekly stock deep dives and analysis of historical market events.

practical.title: Community & Resources
practical.description: Join the community forum, take quizzes, and check out our recommended reading list.
